TWEEPY_CONSUMER_API_KEY.name: Tweepy consumer API key
TWEEPY_CONSUMER_API_KEY.description: Tweepy consumer API key to allow the agent to use Tweepy. How to get it: https://github.com/valory-xyz/meme-ooorr/blob/main/docs/twitter_dev_account.md

TWEEPY_CONSUMER_API_KEY_SECRET.name: Tweepy consumer API key secret
TWEEPY_CONSUMER_API_KEY_SECRET.description: Tweepy consumer API key secret to allow the agent to use Tweepy. How to get it: https://github.com/valory-xyz/meme-ooorr/blob/main/docs/twitter_dev_account.md

TWEEPY_ACCESS_TOKEN.name: Tweepy access token
TWEEPY_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Tweepy access token to allow the agent to use Tweepy. How to get it: https://github.com/valory-xyz/meme-ooorr/blob/main/docs/twitter_dev_account.md

TWEEPY_ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET.name: Tweepy access token secret
TWEEPY_ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET.description: Tweepy access token secret to allow the agent to use Tweepy. How to get it: https://github.com/valory-xyz/meme-ooorr/blob/main/docs/twitter_dev_account.md

TWEEPY_BEARER_TOKEN.name: Tweepy bearer token
TWEEPY_BEARER_TOKEN.description: Tweepy bearer token to allow the agent to use Tweepy. How to get it: https://github.com/valory-xyz/meme-ooorr/blob/main/docs/twitter_dev_account.md

GENAI_API_KEY.name: Gemini api key
GENAI_API_KEY.description: Gemini api key to allow the agent to use Gemini

PERSONA.name: Persona description
PERSONA.description: A persona to describe the personality of the agent

FEEDBACK_PERIOD_HOURS.name: Feedback period
FEEDBACK_PERIOD_HOURS.description: Amount of hours should the agent wait after sending a tweet and before analysing its responses

MIN_FEEDBACK_REPLIES.name: Minimum feedback replies
MIN_FEEDBACK_REPLIES.description: Minimum amount of replies to a tweet before Memeooorr analyses them
